headline: Does Baxter Offer Opportunity After a 37% Share Price Drop and Business Restructuring?
summary: Wondering if Baxter International is a hidden gem or a value trap? You're not alone, especially with the stock catching the eye of investors searching for a bargain. Despite a tough market stretch with a 20.1% dip over the past month and a dramatic 37.4% drop year-to-date, many are asking whether the risk has actually created new upside. In recent weeks, headlines have focused on Baxter's strategic moves, including updates around divestitures and streamlining its business operations. These...
